Posts.Content: I wanted to stop in to say hello to you wonderful ladies.
Posts.Title: Hello ladies
request your stories for an important project

Posts.Content:
Thanks ladies. MK if only 2 family members have had cancer that is enough of a genetic link to warrent consideration of genetic testing. Just in case you have ever thought of it.
Many decide not to test, I have interviewed numerous individuals who have decided that testing would not help and may in fact confuse family issues for them.
Many decide to test if they have children that may be affected.
I had a 2 family link, had cancer at 35 and tested gene negative. 
Thanks again for letting me post here. We will let you know when the book comes out!
Hugs, Kim
Posts.Title: request your stories for an important project

Posts.Content: It has been a while, I have been busy organizing the strides in my town; getting my little one off to kindergarten, the oldest in second grade (sigh).....volunteering for FORCE, etc, etc,
Posts.Title: Hello ladies

Posts.Content:
chat a thon is on now...
go to www.chat-a-thon.com

Hugs, Kim
Posts.Title: Message from Sue @ FORCE Please read

Posts.Content:
Some of the door prizes; I am donating a Timberland Blankie, and a Walmart gift certificate.
There are all sorts of other goodies.
I am working a shift on Saturday from 6-8am est......but will be in for visits during the day tomorrow.
come by and say hi!!!
Hugs, Kim
